title: Linux Kernel 6.12 Is Official! Real Time App Support, Better Scheduling
author: Damon M Garn
description: Now that kernel 6.12 is complete, it's time for you to decide whether to implement it immediately. This article reviews the most relevant features and offers ways to upgrade your Linux devices.
cntitle: Linux内核6.12正式发布！支持实时应用，改进调度
cndescription: 现在内核 6.12 已完成，是时候决定是否立即实施了。本文回顾了最相关的功能，并提供了升级 Linux 设备的方法。
